name: Wolf:Unscripted
description:
Why is the wolf always the bad guy in stories? You play as the wolf in this Ren'Py game and try to be 'Unscripted'.

Created for Public Domain Game Jam 3, where the bonus theme was 'Unscripted'.

Instructions: Download the file and extract the 'Wolf-1.0-all' folder. Then open the folder and double click on the .exe file to play.
